name: Yuan Tsu, Ripenspring Lao
text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, meditate (Put an orb counter on a Chi you control. If you don’t control one, first create a Chi enchantment token with "{1}, Sacrifice this: Copy target spell you control with mana value equal or less to the number of Orb counters on this. You may choose new targets for the copy.")
